attributes.action: Create a new Bank Holiday, “Queen Elizabeth II Day”
attributes.additional_details: Such a day could be created on the late Queen’s birthday (21 April), Accession (6 February), Coronation (2 June) or death (8 September).
attributes.background: To create a new Bank Holiday, “Queen Elizabeth II Day”, to commemorate the remarkable reign of the late Queen Elizabeth II, who ruled between 6 February 1952 and 8 September 2022: notably, longer than any other Monarch in British history.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Queen Elizabeth II Day: New bank holiday 8th September or the Birthday (21.4)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623598
